_header: In summer when the shaws be sheen
Title(s): A Little Jest of Robin Hood and the Monk
_description: A Little Jest of Robin Hood and the Monk — ninety quatrains (abab)

CULFf548.First Lines:
In somer when þe shawes be sheynAnd leves be large and
                    long…
CULFf548.Last Lines:
…god þat is [euer] crowned kyngbryng vs all to his blisse
                    Amen
